alert.note: Alert for Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai Windward; Olomana; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued February 11 at 3:28PM HST until February 13 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING CANCELLED... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR EAST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI MAUI BIG ISLAND AND KAHOOLAWE THROUGH SUNDAY NIGHT... .Large and very rough trade wind swell will gradually decline over the next couple of days, though east shore surf will remain above the High Surf Advisory level through at least Sunday night. Surf along some east facing shores could remain elevated Monday through Wednesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST MONDAY... ...HIGH SURF WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Along east facing shores, large breaking waves of 10 to 14 feet tonight, declining to 8 to 12 feet Sunday. * WHERE...Olomana, Maui Windward West, Kauai East, Koolau Windward, Molokai Windward, Windward Haleakala, Big Island East and Big Island North. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Monday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Big Island East; Big Island North; Kauai East; Koolau Windward; Maui Windward West; Molokai Windward; Olomana; Windward Haleakala
